name: Sword
description: A sharp, metal blade used for slashing and cutting.

name: Battle Axe
description: A heavy, two-handed axe used for chopping and cleaving.

name: Mace
description: A blunt, heavy club used for bludgeoning and crushing.

name: Dagger
description: A small, sharp blade used for stabbing and cutting.

name: Longbow
description: A powerful bow used for ranged combat.

name: Crossbow
description: A mechanical bow used for firing arrows.

name: Warhammer
description: A heavy, two-handed hammer used for crushing and smashing.

name: Spear
description: A long, pointed polearm used for thrusting and impaling.

name: Halberd
description: A combination of axe, spear, and hook used for defense and attacking.

name: Flail
description: A heavy weapon consisting of a chain with a weighted ball at the end.

name: Pike
description: A long, sharp spear used for attacking from horseback.

name: Shield
description: A protective covering used to deflect attacks.

name: Armor
description: A protective suit of metal or leather used to defend against enemy attacks.

name: Helmet
description: A protective head covering to deflect blows and arrows.

name: Javelin
description: A throwing weapon consisting of a long, sharp spearhead on a shaft.

name: Sling
description: A simple weapon used for throwing stones or small objects.

name: Whip
description: A long, flexible leather or rope used for striking and entangling enemies.

name: Trebuchet
description: A massive siege engine used for hurling large projectiles.

name: Catapult
description: A smaller siege engine used for hurling rocks and other projectiles.

name: Battering Ram
description: A heavy wooden frame covered with metal or leather used to break down walls.
